title: 'Succession' S3E3: "Disruption"
description:
Chris and Andy take us through the plot of the latest episode of 'Succession' (2:53) before debating whether or not Kendall is on drugs (37:19) and who is teetering on the edge of the Roy family (42:07).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Kaya McMullen
